header.title: JEGrid - Enterprise Grid Computing for Java

section.title: Background
section.p: This project was started to fulfill a need for a simple, lightweight framework for making a back-end 'compute farm' for a web service that offers it's shared computational power to customers. This particular application already had a J2EE-based front end which is great for all the OLTP, web UI and SOAP tasks, but it was very clear that J2EE was not intended to handle long running, compute-bound tasks that require lots of memory and CPU. So, a grid framework was designed to allow the J2EE application to serve as a front end for the compute farm.
